page.title: 05STREET GAMES
page.content: In our street the children play games every day. The boys play games like {cricket, football, cops and robbers {and chasing.}Sometimes they play {tennis.}The girls play games like {skipping, two balls, hide and seek, {hopscotch and tick.}You can play different kinds of tick like{"ball {tick", "hospital tick" and "duck down {tick".}There are other games like {rounders and "may I".}We play other games with balls like{"piggy in the {middle".}There are quite a lot of other games that girls and boys like to play like{"London", "Polio", {"British Bulldog" and "Manhunt". "Manhunt" and "Kick the Can" are like hide and seek. I have got lots of friends and{we love playing in the {street.
